translations: v．破坏，使计划失败：阻止或破坏某事的成功或发展。

sentences.sentence: So far, however, none has succeeded in scuppering the three-year-old peace process.
sentences.translation: 然而，到目前为止，没有人能成功破坏已经进入第三年的和平进程。

sentences.sentence: Even a few years away from your connections can mean they go cold, scuppering your chance of promotion.
sentences.translation: 甚至几年前与你疏远关系就意味着他们将受到冷遇，为你提供升迁的机会。

sentences.sentence: Even a few years away from your connections can mean they go cold, scuppering your chance of promotion.
sentences.translation: 甚至你远离这些关系仅几年而已，它们就会变得冷淡，你也就失去了升职的机会。
